jabber.stream.TopLevelPacketListener<T>

type
class
subclasses
jabber.MessageListener
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Abstract base for top level packet listeners ( jabber.PresenceListener, jabber.MessageListener ).

Instance Variables

collector(default,null) : PacketCollector

The collector for this listener. Public because extra/changed filters and settings may get applied.

listen(default,setListening) : Bool

Activates/Deactivates packet collecting.

stream(default,null) : jabber.Stream

Instance Methods

dynamic onPacket(p : T) : Void
